1: <mistake>rgsyun</mistake> du mtshan mo <mistake>dang/ nyin</mistake> mor bcas pa 'gro ba <mistake>dang/ gnas</mistake> pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa <mistake>dang gnyid</mistake> <mistake>log</mistake> pa <mistake>dang/gnyid sa</mistake> <mistake>dpa</mistake> <mistake>dang/ mnyam</mistake> par gzhag <mistake>pa</mistake> dang / mnyam <mistake>par ma</mistake> gzhag pa <mistake>dang/gcig</mistake>
2: bur gnas pa <mistake>dang/skye</mistake> bo ming <mistake>po'i</mistake> nang du son pa <mistake>dang /ji</mistake> srid grong dang grong khyer <mistake>dang/grong</mistake> rdal <mistake>dang/ljongs</mistake> <mistake>dang/yul</mistake> <mistake>'khor</mistake> <mistake>dang/rgyal</mistake> <mistake>bo'i</mistake> pho brang na gnas pa <mistake>dang dbang</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> phur ba <mistake>dag/</mistake>
3: sgo khang <mistake>dang/ lam</mistake> srang dang / srang <mistake>dang/ bzhi</mistake> mdo <mistake>dang/ sum</mistake> mdo <mistake>dang/grong</mistake> khyer gyi bar <mistake>dang tshog</mistake> khang gi nang <mistake>du</mistake> gnas <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>dang/ji</mistake> srid khang stong <mistake>dang/ ri</mistake> dang dgon pa <mistake>dang/ chu</mistake> klung dang / dur krod dang
4: <mistake>nags</mistake> <mistake>thong</mistake> tshing du nye bar son pa <mistake>dang//'bags</mistake> pa <mistake>dang/m</mistake> 'bags pa <mistake>dang/myos</mistake> pa <mistake>dang/rab</mistake> tu <mistake>myos</mistake> pa na rtag tu thams <mistake>cang</mistake> kyi <mistake>tsho</mistake> rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu <mistake>srung</mistake> ba <mistake>dang/bskyab</mistake> pa <mistake>dang sbod</mistake>
5: <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>byed</mistake> par 'gyur <mistake>ro// nyin</mistake> mo dang mtshan <mistake>mo</mistake> mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur <mistake>ro//gzhan</mistake> yang gang lha dang klu <mistake>dang/gnod</mistake> sbyin dang / dri <mistake>ra dang//lha</mistake> ma yin <mistake>dang/nam</mistake> mkha' <mistake>ldang</mistake> <mistake>dang/</mistake>
6: mi <mistake>'am</mistake> ci <mistake>dang/lto</mistake> 'phye chen po <mistake>dang/mi</mistake> dang <mistake>ma</mistake> <mistake>ma yin</mistake> pa rnams <mistake>dang/gzhan</mistake> yang gang gza' dang rgyu <mistake>skag</mistake> dang ma <mistake>ma</mistake> <mistake>dang /tshogs</mistake> kyi <mistake>bidag</mistake> po rnams <mistake>dang /gang</mistake> yang ma mo <mistake>bdun</mistake> po rnams <mistake>dang</mistake>
7: gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo dang sha za mo rnams <mistake>te/ de</mistake> rnams thams cad lhan cig mthun par <mistake>sde</mistake> dang bcas <mistake>pa/ 'khor</mistake> dang bcas <mistake>pa</mistake> rnams <mistake>kyis /spod</mistake> lam dang lam rnams su yang <mistake>mchog /</mistake>
8: tu <mistake>bsung</mistake> ba dang / bskyab pa <mistake>dang /spa ba</mistake> <mistake>byed</mistake> par 'gyur <mistake>ro //gzhan</mistake> yang <mistake>de'i</mistake> lus la <mistake>mdans</mistake> dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed <mistake>do //nad</mistake> med pa <mistake>dang/ stobs</mistake> <mistake>dang /tshe</mistake> 'phel ba yang nye bar
